<h1 align="center">
  IP Blog Starter Theme
</h1>

## About

This starter blog theme was built on top of the Gatsby default starter. 

**What it includes:** 

- Theme UI and base styling setup.
- 16 column CSS Grid.
- Netlify CMS connection

## Netlify

Change the connection settings in static/admin/config.js

## Metadata

Change titles and descritions in gatsby-config.js

## Typography and Styles

Adjust typography/styles in gatsby-plugin-theme/index.js 

## Global Styles

Adjust global styles (including the base grid layout) in globalStyles.js
